thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 103 of 7354
thread.title: SHARONA

author: SHARONA
title: SHARONA
text: I made my first order with B&H on recommendation from a friend. Made a big purchase. My first "fancy" camera. Before I have always owned a small camera, one that I can slip into my pocket. I bought one with lens and accessories. my order arrived when promised and quickly.It was packaged safely so nothing was damaged. I was able to track it all the way from start to finish. Then to my surprise I also received a rewards card. So I was able to get more toys for camera, that were on my wish list anyways at no additional cost. I will be back for more toys for my camera for sure.
